title: Exploring half-metallic ferromagnetism and thermoelectric properties of Tl2WX6 (X = Cl and Br) double perovskites
content:

Ghulam M. Mustafa, Zaka Ullah, M. Adil Ameer, N. A. Noor, Sohail Mumtaz, Mohammad K. Al-Sadoon
Half-metallic semiconductors typically exhibit 100% spin polarization at the Fermi level which makes them desired materials for spintronic applications.
